itunes:title: Episode 795 - Special Guests Brett Favre and Eric Bolling
title: Episode 795 - Special Guests Brett Favre and Eric Bolling
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NFL Hall of Fame quarterback Brett Favre and former Fox News host Eric Bolling to talk about their new podcast ‘Bolling with Favre’, Brett’s awkward first ever NFL practice with the Atlanta Falcons, how Eric ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NFL Hall of Fame quarterback Brett Favre and former Fox News host Eric Bolling to talk about their new podcast ‘Bolling with Favre’, Brett’s awkward first ever NFL practice with the Atlanta Falcons, how Eric and Brett were treated after they said they were voting for Donald Trump, and how Brett got recruited to play quarterback in college despite the fact that he never threw a pass in high school.

 

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
